title: Pelicans Catch Up to the Suns
description:
Jalen Rose and David Jacoby recap an incredible weekend of the NBA Playoffs, including seeing the Pelicans tie up the series against Phoenix, the Celtics take a commanding 3-0 lead against the Nets and the Nuggets survive against the Warriors. All that and more!
